github.copilot.chat.commitMessageGenerat.text: Use imperative present tense verb at the start of the commit message subject, like "Fix", "Add", or "Refactor". The subject should be in one line, no more than 72 characters.
Separate the subject from the body with a blank line. The body should explain the reason for the change in one or more sentences.
Use the Conventional Commits format where possible. For example: `feat(feature-name): Add new feature`. If using gitmoji, use a colon to separate the emoji from the description.
